overview: The cock-stiffening thriller Spitting Image: Twin Trouble casts the Rosso twins as sexual spirits who envelop and inspire every man's sexual desires. The twins appear in every scene to guide the likes of Dylan Roberts, Trey Turner, Jonny Rock, blond newcomer Alex Andrews and others into deviate acts of hotness - all culminating in an explosive threeway between the twins and the huge uncut dick of Connor Maguire. Following on the heels of the smash-hit Brother Fucker: The Ultimate Twin Taboo, identical twins Liam and Luca Rosso decide to deepen their brotherly bond in award-winning director Chi Chi LaRue's sizzling spank-a-thon Spitting Image: Twin Trouble.
title: Spitting Image: Twin Trouble
